title: Quarkus 2.11.3.Final released - Fix for CVE-2022-2466 and other bugfixes
content: 2.11.3.Final is our third maintenance release for the 2.11 release train. It is a safe upgrade for anyone using 2.11. Among other issues, it fixes CVE-2022-2466 that was affected our quarkus-smallrye-graphql extension. Migration Guide If you are not already using 2.11, please refer to our migration guide.
